data.md:MetaData: Tree-ring measurements of Pinus sylvestris (Scotch pine) from sample NARVIK-201

Exposition W, Slope 20 deg, Geology: Amphibolith Schiefer, Tree line 350 m, av. Tree height 7 m, Tree cover 30%, Shrub cover 20%, Herb cover 40%, Moss cover 60%, Vegatation type: Lophozio lycopodietum-Pinetum lapponicae, Film number: 528A
